description: Zoey Monroe has been trading sexy letters with a thug in prison who she is trying to rehabilitate. She becomes infatuated and begs her pen-pal to behave so he can get released soon. Stuffed in every hole, ass pounded, face fucked and used as a cum rag.
title: Conjugal fantasy gone wild! Cute prison pen-pal taken down by ex-cons.
